ygData.subject: Gnomestock '99
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh heh.  The college student is Manager of Clinical Research at a medical products firm, who is almost never free on Saturdays, but amazingly gets a
ygData.messageBody:
> >From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>Noon on a Friday? What college student is organizing this shindig anyhow?
>I don't want to sound *too* much like the decrepid cog in the workforce
>that I am, but some of us might have to work and stuff.

Heh heh. The "college student" is Manager of Clinical Research at a medical
products firm, who is almost never free on Saturdays, but amazingly gets a
work holiday every now and again. = )

I really am sorry I can't choose a day that works for everyone. Since this
idea was kicked around for over a month, nobody ever chose a day... I picked
one that was convenient for me, and for many others.

If you are able to come, please do. I hope it will be fun for everyone
involved.

Aloro Silvertongue (E'ci)
